Gloria Osei Sarfo bụ onye Ghana na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-eme ihe ngosi TV
Ọ meriri onye na-akwado ihe nkiri kacha mma na 2020 Africa Magic Viewers' Choice Awards maka ọrụ ya na foto Shirley Frimping Manso 's The Perfect Picture- Ten Years Later
Sarfo malitere ọrụ ime ihe nkiri n'etiti afọ 2000, na-eme ihe nkiri na Revele Films' Hotel Saint James
O wuru ewu mgbe o mechara ọrụ Nana Ama na Efiewura
Sarfo meriri onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha  akwado na 2020 Africa Magic Viewers' Choice Awards
